title: Websplosion Announces Chameleon.Urban Android App
text:
The well-known company Websplosion from UK is happy to announce an Android App for its Chameleon.Urban template.
Chameleon Social & Dating Software is a PHP+MySQL software script that is meant to build a dating, a social dating, or a social networking website. All one needs to do is to buy a domain name at GoDaddy.com and that's it, within an hour one has an own social network or a dating website! One can monetize it if she wishes or can make it a free website and earn on Google Adsense.
Now with the introduction of the Android app the site's members will interact with your website more often. It is simple: the main problem is always how to make the registered members to come back to the website. People just forget about its existence. They live their lives and probably that website is not the most important thing in the Universe for them. But having an app in their phones they will have to come back to the website because of the push notifications which will come whenever a new message is sent to them, for example.
That is why a mobile app is of vital importance for a social networking or a dating website nowadays. One forgets about the website but then a push notification comes and he starts a new dialogue and begins to actively use the website and maybe even buy a paid membership. Android phones has a huge 80% market share now, so having just an Android app makes the owner of a website forget about this very particular problem of all dating and social networking websites, even Facebook (Remember Facebook making you install the messenger app? It is for the same reason. They want you to come back. And come back again to the website).
So if you want to start a social networking or a dating website please think about having an app for it. It may sound obvious but people do not really know why exactly an app is so vital now.
Check Chameleon Dating & Social Software at http://www.chameleonsocial.com
